title: 155 - Big Motor's Historic American Ninja Warrior Run
description: On today's show, the boys chat about what they did over the weekend and what different movies and shows they watched including a very high mark for Cruella, which a couple of the guys absolutely loved. The guys then jump right into the Pod FOD to discuss various things including Bill's unbelievable run on American Ninja Warrior that includes footage, the cicadas still being a rather large issue around here, a woman who reportedly was pregnant with 10 kids, a homeless woman who died in Oregon before she could receive a 884 thousand dollar inheritance, Mitt explains the logistics of Tik Tok, plus much more. Be sure to subscribe to the Youtube channel in order to watch clips and full episodes of the show, and keep sending your submissions and questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you on Friday.
